data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Form Metinleri'
define root view entity ZRECO_DDL_I_HTXT
  as select from zreco_htxt
{
  key bukrs  as Bukrs,
  key spras  as Spras,
  key mtype  as Mtype,
  key ftype  as Ftype,
      bktxt          as Bktxt,
      idate_text     as IdateText,
      response_text  as ResponseText,
      responder_text as ResponderText,
      mtext_text     as MtextText,
      mnumber_text   as MnumberText,
      mdate_text     as MdateText,
      mperiod_text   as MperiodText,
      anumber_text   as AnumberText,
      mcontact_text  as McontactText,
      call_text      as CallText,
      customer       as Customer,
      vendor         as Vendor,
      customer_text  as CustomerText,
      vendor_text    as VendorText,
      btotal_text    as BtotalText,
      debit_text     as DebitText,
      credit_text    as CreditText,
      taxoffice_text as TaxofficeText,
      taxnumber_text as TaxnumberText,
      bukrs_ba_text  as BukrsBaText,
      bukrs_bs_text  as BukrsBsText,
      firm_ba_text   as FirmBaText,
      firm_bs_text   as FirmBsText,
      subject        as Subject,
      type_text      as TypeText,
      doc_text       as DocText,
      loc_text       as LocText,
      doc_ans_text   as DocAnsText,
      loc_ans_text   as LocAnsText,
      doc_waers_text as DocWaersText,
      kur_text       as KurText,
      from_mail      as FromMail,
      color_code     as ColorCode
}
